INFO.TITLE: Informations and rules
INFO.MATCH_TIP_DEADLINE: You can enter your vote for the final result at any time before the official start of the match.
INFO.MATCH_RESULT_WRITE: We are trying to write the results as soon as possible. However, no later than 48 hours after the end of the match.
INFO.MATCH_DEADLINE: Matches are displayed 14 days into the future and 14 days into the past.
